data.title: LEE JUNHO 1st FANMEETING TOUR <JUNHO THE MOMENT 2023> IN MACAU
data.description:
準備好了嗎？

2PM LEE JUNHO 將展開個人出道後的首次粉絲見面會巡演《JUNHO THE MOMENT 2023》！

在演員身份取得成功也兼顧偶像本業的李俊昊，本次見面會《JUNHO THE MOMENT 2023》如同巡演主題名稱一樣，李俊昊將完整地把「現在這一瞬間」的自己與全部的粉絲共享。

Are you ready?

South Korean actor Lee Jun-ho will be in Macau on Nov. 4th

The star of the hit K-drama King The Land (2023), who is also a member of K-pop boy band 2PM, will embark on his first solo fan meeting tour

With his soaring success both as a singer and actor, the fan meeting tour is seeing a broader horizon across major Asian cities.


時間：2023/11/04 (SAT) 18:00

地點：中國澳門｜新濠影滙綜藝館

Date：2023/11/04 (SAT) 18:00

Venue: STUDIO CITY EVENT CENTER


*Ticket Price(MOP): GROUP PHOTO PACKAGE $1888/ SEND OFF PACKAGE $1788/ SIGNED POSTER PACKAGE $1688 / FLOOR $1588 / A $1488 / B $988 / C $688(全場坐席)

*全場票價皆可獲得「澳門場限定小卡+藝人手寫印刷信+ HIBYE」All categories will also receive an Exclusive Post Card, Printed handwritten letter and Hibye!


EXCLUSIVE PACKAGE 套組禮包


GROUP PHOTO PACKAGE 套組禮包 MOP1888

*FLOOR TICKET *1 / 一張內場座票

*GROUP PHOTO WITH ARTIST AFTER THE SHOW (15 PAX PER PHOTO) / 演出後與藝人團體合影 (15人一組)

*PHOTO CARD1 /一張藝人小卡


SEND OFF PACKAGE 套組禮包 MOP1788

*FLOOR TICKET *1 / 一張內場座票

*SEND OFF PARTY / 歡送道別

*PHOTO CARD1 /一張藝人小卡


SIGNED POSTER PACKAGE 套組禮包 MOP1688

*FLOOR TICKET *1 / 一張內場座票

*SIGNED POSTER1 / 一張親筆簽名海報

*PHOTO CARD1 /一張藝人小卡


座位圖 Seat Map


購票注意事項

· 套組如果轉售，所有福利內容將失效。

· 套組和福利內容不可轉讓、不可退款或換貨，所有銷售均為最終決定。

· 所有套組（包括地點和套組內容）可能會根據現場情況而有所不同，並可能因任何原因隨時更改。

· 您有責任確保您在購買時提供的聯繫資訊（如真實姓名、電子郵件和位址）是正確且最新的，主辦方、票務公司或經紀方對因資訊不正確而導致無法交付之產品內容後果不承擔任何責任。

· 所有套組（例如福利內容及物品）均需在演出日當天現場領取。

· 如果您錯過報到時間，將不會獲得補償福利。請準時抵達辦理報到手續。

· 出於個人安全考慮，工作人員保留拒絕任何人入場或將其逐出活動的權利。所有活動參與者必須遵守場地規則和規定，並接受現場搜查/安全檢查。不允許攜帶武器或任何種類的違禁物品。

· 工作人員保留在進入場館時搜查任何隨身物品或行李的權利。


Important Note

· All package elements will be rendered invalid if resold.

· Packages and contents are non-transferable, no refunds or exchanges, all sales are final.

· All package items (including locations and package inclusions) may vary based on on-site situation and are subject to change at any time for any reason.

· You are responsible for ensuring that your contact information (such as Real Name, email and address) provided at the time of purchase is correct and current and the tour promoter, ticketing company or any other affiliated parties are not responsible where incorrect information results in an undelivered product.

· All Package components (e.g. Merchandise) are to be picked up at the venue on-site.

· There will be no replacement benefit if you miss part of the event. Please arrive on time to check-in.

· Staff reserves the right to refuse admission or eject any person to or from the event due to security concerns on an individual basis. All event participants must adhere to venue rules and regulations and are subject to search/security screening on site. No weapons nor any prohibited items of any kinds are permitted.

· Security reserves the right to search any bags upon entry to the venue.
data.location: 中國澳門 | 新濠影匯綜藝館
